28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated from Judamah bint Wahb Al-Asadiyyah that she heard the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) saying:"I intended to prohibit Al-Ghilah until I remembered that the Persians and Romans do that, without any harm to their children

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Al-Ghilah
